subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Hey guys--Another Box

-------------------------------1209557188
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Lc,
 
Yeah, this box is very strange.  It will sound all robotic and than go  off 
on a some wild demonic sounding voices.  Not really sure why it does  that, but 
hey it was only day 1 with it.  I thought it was the battery, so  i changed 
it and it still acted somewhat strange.  I'm going to attach a  sample of the 
strange audio sounds coming from this thing last night.
 
-Steve H.
